item.description:
The July Meet-Up will be at Pete's great gallery, Corner Stone Creations in Fiskdale ( Sturbridge.)

We will start the meet-up with a wine tasting and appetizer feast....
Bring a bottle of your favorite wine to share, and enjoy a wide array of great pot luck appetizers to boot!

After the wine tasting and appetizers, we will have a brief meet-up planning meeting, and then
do a spell swap, with everyone bringing a copy of their favorite spells for everyone else!

We will then have an open pagan discussion on:
How do you see God?
The Goddess and the God?
The Goddess's and the Gods?

Were the Gods there first, or did we create them?

Please note, the meet-up will be for (2 1/2) hours, and no one will be allowed to leave Pete's place drunk-
If you would like to get "toasted" please plan on having a designated driver :)

Schedule of events:

7:00- 8:00 pm- Wine Tasting/ Appetizer Feast Social

8:00- 8:15 pm- Planning Meeting

8:15- 8:30 Spell Swap

8:30- 9:30 Pagan Discussion

Pot luck will be organized on the list, and remember to bring some extra money in case you
see something you can't live without in Pete's gallery....He has some great stuff, at VERY
affordable prices! :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
item.how_to_find_us: Pete's place is located on Rte 20 in Fiskdale (Sturbridge)
item.why: It will be alot of fun, because we will be wine tasting, eating great pot luck appetizers, swapping spells, and having a pagan discussion! :)
item.name: Wine Tasting/ Pot Luck/ Spell Swap Social
